title: Mobile Experiential Learning Course for Strengthening Mechanical Engineering Practical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mechanical engineering theory and administrative/management work experience
context.additional_context: Learners work during the day and study in the evenings using mobile devices; practical content delivered in 10-minute microlearning formats

learning_goals: Learners can apply mechanical system design principles to real-life cases and propose problem-solving solutions
Learners can explain the connection between mechanical engineering theory and field practice through mobile-based experiential learning activities
Learners can analyze mechanical engineering problems occurring in real work environments and write solution procedures using digital worksheets
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
